name: Play Pool Snooker - 8Ball
description:
Play Pool Snooker - 8Ball is accumulation of 8 balls over diversified pools assemble with number of sticks and players. Monotony of game is evacuated by variety of levels from easy to difficult.
Features
• Stunning 3D graphic animation
• Interconnected games level
• Stimulating playing modes; i.e. Arcade, Practice, Two players
• Excellent Competitive environment
• Real life experience of Billiard
• Magnificent customized cue and Pool function
